title: Bug : my pc closes when i enter game
body: I really don't know why this happens.it's very weird for me.it is probably  my problem,not the servers problem.whenever i enter a game (after the loading screen displaying the champs) it shows the champions all in the nexus caged ( the period you can't use teleport ) . and that time my pc shuts off like you cut off the power.it has happened many times,it's not the first time it happens at the very same moment.then i have to boot my pc ....i boot it and start the client...rejoin the game ( then there is no problem....i play the game ) .of course i get the afk error. and now after many tries a message popped up : "Due to recent leaving and AFK behaviors on this account, you will be placed in a lower priority queue for 5 matchmade games." .......i really don't want to be afk but my pc shuts off for no reason....this has not happened in any other game i play.

replies.body:
There are a couple of things that could be causing this. Most recently, there were some Windows 10 updates that have been problematic for some players with system freezes causing PC restarts and such. I recommend [disabling the Windows Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html), as it has been the primary culprit for a lot of these issues.

Let me know if this helped.
